pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 8, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the International Labour Organization’s (ILO) Virtual Global Summit on COVID-19.

The Prime Minister’s remarks can be streamed on the ILO website.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation, and a media availability will follow.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the sitting of the House of Commons.
